name: TFS
additional_notices: Kindly be aware of liquidity-related risks. This notice is not directed at any project in particular, and is more of a cautionary reminder.

description.en:
TFS token - a new digital cryptocurrency that will be used within the well-established ecosystem of Fairspin trusted by over 300.000 registered users so far.  
Key features are:

1️⃣ Hold To Earn - is a traditional staking model based on a certain % from Fairspin's platform daily income that is being shared in-between its participants.

2️⃣ Play To Earn - is a tokenized cashback that is being credited to players as a reward for playing.

3️⃣ BuyBack model - The core of the model is centered around both Play to Earn & Hold to Earn Programs through which users get rewarded.
